room:{}




}

const roomsReducer=(state=initState,action)=>{
console.log(action.tp)
switch(action.type){
   
case "FEATURED":

    return{...state,room:state.rooms.filter(r=>r.type===action.tp)};


    default:
        return state;
}

}

export default roomsReducer;
